text: qal zkryaa: rabi ajeal liy elamtan astdll biha ealaa wujud alwld mny; liahsul li alsrwr walastbshar, qal: elamtk alty tlbtha: 'alaa tastatie altahaduth 'iilaa alnaas thalathat 'ayaam 'iilaa b'ishart 'ilyhm, mae 'anak swy shyh, wafi hadhih almudat akthir min dhakar rbk, wsll lah 'awakhir alnahar wawaylh
